name: Google BreakPad Crash Log Extra File
summary: Learn about .EXTRA files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: EXTRA files created by Mozilla Firefox are saved to the [user]\​AppData\​Roaming\​Mozilla\​Firefox\​Crash Reports\​pending\​ directory.
NOTE: EXTRA files are often accompanied by .DUMP files as well.

description: Crash log file created by Google BreakPad, an open source crash reporting tool used by products such as Mozilla Firefox; may be saved to the local file system upon program crash; can be submitted to the software developers to determine the cause of the crash.
